name: BLT Bacon Bowls
author: KoalaFace
summary: A crisp bowl made of bacon with lettuce and tomato inside. Great for appetizers or a party. Served room temperature, these are sure to be a hit!
ingredients: 1 head butter lettuce - rinsed, and torn
directions: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Turn two muffin tins upside down, and cover the outside of 9 cups with aluminum foil
Weave the bacon into a mat that is 9 strips across and 9 strips wide
Place each square over one of the foil covered muffin cups
Bake the bacon in the preheated oven until crisp, about 10 minutes
Remove the bacon cups from the pan and allow to cool completely
Once cooled, fill each with some lettuce and tomato halves
